text: Dominica was first at the Olympic Games in 1996. They have been in each Games since then. Thea LaFond won the countryâ€™s first gold medal in the 2024 Paris Games in the long jump. The Dominica Olympic Committee was formed in 1993 and recognized in 1998. Dominica has not been in any Winter Olympic Games. ==Olympic table Summer== Games Athletes Athletes by sport Athletes by sport Medals Medals Medals Games Athletes Atlanta 1996 6 5 1 0 0 0 Sydney 2000 4 2 2 0 0 0 Athens 2004 2 2 0 0 0 0 Bejiing 2008 2 2 0 0 0 0 ==Related pages== * List of IOC country codes == References == ==Other websites == * Dominica profile at London2012.com Category:Dominica Category:Nations at the Olympics
title: Dominica at the Olympics
